description: Our proposals will help make room for growth expected in and around the Fiveways area in Croydon

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We are working with Croydon Council on transport plans to allow for growth expected in the A23/A232 Fiveways area. We hope to begin construction in late 2021 or early 2022."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
We plan to submit a planning application later in 2019.
Since a 2017 consultation on our proposals, we have made changes to some areas of the design.
Our detailed response to that consultation, and final proposals showing how we want to move forward with the project, is on the Fiveways Croydon consultation page .
The finished work will help to support the Mayor's Transport Strategy .

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Improve road safety","Create better conditions for pedestrians and cyclists","Support growth in Croydon","Improve journey times","Create new public spaces to develop Waddon as a local centre"]}
